scenario_text.value: That wasn’t that tough.

Jeez... This isn’t the time for us to be
fighting, you know.

Still, that’s got me more fired up about this
search than ever.
Why’s that?

Because you never know, Aoi might be in
danger right now.

I know she’s got Labramon with her, but I’m
still worried about them being on their own.
(Minoru really has come a long way.)

(I feel like the thing to do now is say
something to get him even more fired up.)

(If I called him a superhero...would that
sound too corny?)

(Maybe I should stick with something more
normal about how we should both keep at it.)
(What should I say to Minoru?)
Go get ’em, Superhero!
Let’s both keep at it!
Go get ’em, Superhero!
Go get ’em, Superhero!
Haha! Leave it to me! Minoru to the rescue!

Let’s gooo! Man, I could not be more psyched
for this!

Heh... Some things never change. Just don’t
let your guard down, Minoru.
Let’s both keep at it!

Right, let’s both keep at this with all we’ve
got. Never give up until we find Aoi!
Yeah, you said it!

All right, Takuma, we’re gonna go check out
the underground waterway.

Got it! And you never know when you might get
attacked again, so watch out!
